titleStmt.title: The tempestuous soul calmed by Jesus Christ; being an extract of several sermons, / preached by Anthony Palmer, pastor of the church at Bourton on the Water in Gloucester-shire.
titleStmt.author: Palmer, Anthony, 1618?-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for E. Brewster and G. Sawbridge, and are to be sold at the signe of the Bible on Ludgate-hill.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "June 7"; an extra "I" has been added in MS. at end of Roman numeral imprint date.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Bible on Ludgate-hill.
